job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Production Developer, you will lead the integration of AI, 3D, and motion production innovations to streamline workflows and develop new capabilities within the studio. Your focus will be on creating scalable, efficient production processes and ensuring industry-leading quality in both physical and digital media.

   You will:
     * Lead collaborations on virtual production, motion artistry, and AI to explore, develop, and establish new production capabilities.
     * Drive the development of lean processes and automation solutions across the studio, optimizing workflows, reducing costs, and ensuring high quality for customer-facing solutions.
     * Support the integration of new production workflows, tools, and standards.
     * Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.
     * Stay up-to-date with trends in the media landscape, including GenAI, 3D, and motion production, and explore new innovations to enhance customer communication and production processes.
job_details.full_text:
Motion & ai production developer

As a Production Developer, you will lead the integration of AI, 3D, and motion production innovations to streamline workflows and develop new capabilities within the studio. Your focus will be on creating scalable, efficient production processes and ensuring industry-leading quality in both physical and digital media.

   You will:
     * Lead collaborations on virtual production, motion artistry, and AI to explore, develop, and establish new production capabilities.
     * Drive the development of lean processes and automation solutions across the studio, optimizing workflows, reducing costs, and ensuring high quality for customer-facing solutions.
     * Support the integration of new production workflows, tools, and standards.
     * Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.
     * Stay up-to-date with trends in the media landscape, including GenAI, 3D, and motion production, and explore new innovations to enhance customer communication and production processes.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating AI, 3D, and motion production innovations to streamline workflows and develop new capabilities within a studio environment. While it mentions AI and GenAI, it lacks specific details about core AI/ML engineering tasks such as model development, training, or deployment of predictive or generative models. The emphasis is on workflow optimization, automation solutions, and integrating existing tools rather than building or fine-tuning AI models themselves. This aligns more with a role that leverages AI for production enhancement rather than a core AI development role.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding studio workflows, optimizing processes, reducing costs, and ensuring quality for customer-facing solutions, which requires understanding the business context and translating needs into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: streamline workflows and develop new capabilities within the studio

job_tasks.justification: The role requires staying updated with industry trends and exploring innovations to enhance customer communication and production processes, indicating a need to align technical efforts with business goals and market trends.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with trends in the media landscape, including GenAI, 3D, and motion production, and explore new innovations to enhance customer communication and production processes.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on leading the integration of AI, 3D, and motion production innovations, which implies developing or integrating software solutions to create new capabilities and streamline workflows.
job_tasks.phrase: lead the integration of AI, 3D, and motion production innovations to streamline workflows and develop new capabilities within the studio

job_tasks.justification: Driving the development of automation solutions and optimizing workflows suggests building or implementing software-based systems to improve efficiency.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive the development of lean processes and automation solutions across the studio

job_tasks.justification: Supporting the integration of new production workflows and tools implies working with and potentially developing software components or systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Support the integration of new production workflows, tools, and standards.

job_tasks.justification: Acting as a bridge between teams to gather insights and improve capabilities suggests a role in understanding user needs and translating them into technical improvements or solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.
